title: The winner of the lottery, Shane Messler, gives money for the pensioners?
subtitle: A Twitter account that promises $5,000 for the RWIT does not actually belong to the 20-year-old winner Miga millions.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The winner of Shin Messler's lottery gives $5,000 to the first 50,000 followers who retweeted his website.
